content: on working only into the inside loops of the last row of the head you will be working single crochets into the outside loops next so leave them exposed take your time to make sure the head is sewn on neatly and straight the upper most loops should be sewn between row 6&7 the bottom most loops should be sewn between row 8&9 once you ve finished sewing turn the tip of the penis upside down using peach yarn insert your hook into of the loops you left exposed and work single_crochet all the way around after you ve finished f/o begin stuffing the tip and continue working on the shaft designed and written by crystal mihaylo pickrel - not your nana s yarnwork - 2019 - all rights reserved 3 winston the willy pattern rounds 11-13 single_crochet in each st 15 now is when you should give your penis his face attach the safety between row 10&11 of the shaft about 5 st apart embroider the smile using dark peach yarn stuff a little more and finish the remaining rounds of the shaft rounds 14-25 single_crochet in each st 15 finish stuffing the shaft f/o and make the balls balls using tan yarn round 1 6sc in magic_ring pull tight 6 round 2 2sc in each st 12 round 3 *single_crochet in 1 st 2sc in next* repeat around 18 rounds 4-6 single_crochet in each st 18 round 7 *single_crochet in 1 st decrease next 2 st* repeat around 12 f/o and leave a tail for sewing make another but do not cut the tail or f/o the second one you will be continuing from the last st of round 7 later designed and written by crystal mihaylo pickrel - not your nana s yarnwork - 2019 - all rights reserved 4 winston the willy pattern sew the balls to each other sewing into 5 st from each ball make sure you are working into the 5 st above where you left off on round 7 of the second ball and leaving the rest exposed next sew the balls to the shaft working into 6 stitches at the top of the balls 3 from each ball and 5 stitches at the front of the shaft now when you turn your penis around there will be an opening where the shaft meets the balls designed and written by crystal mihaylo pickrel - not your nana s yarnwork - 2019 - all rights reserved 5 winston the willy pattern closing up the back round 1 single_crochet in each st working over any tails you have left from sewing 18 round 2 *single_crochet in 1 st decrease next 2 st* repeat around 12 make sure everything is stuffed properly round 3 decrease 2 st x6 6 ℅ and use the tail to close any gaps you may have between the balls your willy is now finished if you wish to add a little blush effect to the cheeks just mix a bit
